flawed_nl_solution:
Madeline needs 1200+400+200+60+200 = $<<1200+400+200+60+200=2060>>2060 to pay all of her bills.
She will need to work $2060/$15 per hour = 116.2104985198 hours.
She will need to work 117 hours to pay all of her bills

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 137.33333333333334, not 116.2104985198. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
